name: Samurai Slash (AtmoGD)
description:
Best Experience right now on mobile:

Tap left - Jump

Tap right - Attack

Keyboard:

Enter - Start Game

Space - Jump

Left Mouse Click / Shift - Attack

P - Pause / Play

Gamepad -> I don't know why but you first have to die one time befor you can use it

South Button - Jump

Left Shoulder / West Button - Attack
